string.text: Encrypted Transmission
Intercept intermittent radio transmissions in the Iron Forest anomaly of Zaton.
You have detected the source of the radio transmissions. Investigate.
Radio
This unassuming military-grade radio can intercept and decrypt nearby transmissions.
Operation Afterglow: Rally Point
Eliminate the UNISG squad that occupies the ranger station.
Discuss what's next with Degtyarev.
The rest of the UNISG squad is returning to their base. Extend a warm welcome to them.
You have eliminated local UNISG forces. Discuss what's next with Degtyarev.
Search the bodies for a source of useful information.
You have found the squad leader's PDA. Hand it to Degtyarev.
Squad leader's PDA

This PDA used to belong to the squad leader of a UNISG special reconnaissance team. Probably contains important tactical or strategic information. Obviously, it's encrypted, so no way to know for sure.
Report
Report to your leader on what happened in Zaton.
Operation Afterglow: Special Delivery
Deliver the case to a military officer. You may fail to do so to covertly aid the UNISG.
Report to Degtyarev that you've successfully delivered the case.
Seems that the military officer is dead. Report to Degtyarev that you're unable to complete the task.
Seems that you didn't deliver the case in time. Report to Degtyarev that you were unable to complete the task.
Sealed case
Sealed case that contains undisclosed contents. Rather heavy.
Operation Afterglow: Undercover Agent
Meet the secret agent who infiltrated UNISG forces and retrieve useful information from him. Suspicious behaviour might put UNISG on alert and increase their vigilance.
You were able to obtain the information without alerting UNISG forces. Report back to Degtyarev.
You were able to obtain the information, but not without alerting UNISG forces. Report back to Degtyarev.
Undercover agent's pendrive

According to Degtyarev's somewhat cryptic briefing, the spy among UNISG has been collecting some information on their goals and movements, as well as evidence that could place legal or political pressure on the UN troops to leave the Zone. Obviously encrypted.
Operation Afterglow: Guarded Secrets
Eliminate the UNISG forces who are ransacking the old Jupiter factory. Alternatively, stall Degtyarev to let UNISG escape with the information they seek.
You've eliminated the UNISG squad. Discuss what's next with Degtyarev.
Find any remaining top secret documents inside the factory.
You've found the documents. Talk with Degtyarev.
You were too late, and the UNISG forces left with the documents. Talk with Degtyarev.
Jupiter factory documents
Presumably the last documents which contain secret information left in the factory. Better not let them fall into the hands of foreign agents.
Sharpshooter
Help Strelok deal with a pursuing Monolith squad.
Talk with Strelok.
Escort Strelok to the laundromat.
Talk with Strelok.
War Within
Meet Rogue and find out what happened.
Help Rogue recover from the effects of a psy-field anomaly by giving him a single dose of psy-block.
Give the psy-block pill to Rogue.
Escort Rogue to the laundromat.
Rogue succumbed to the effects of the anomaly. Inform Strelok about his fate.
Walking Dead
Help Stitch fend off the zombies.
You've eliminated the zombies. Talk with Stitch.
Escort Stitch to the laundromat.
Stitch wasn't able to make it. Inform Strelok about his fate.
Operation Afterglow: Loose Ends
Confront Colonel Degtyarev about his current mission.
Negotiate with Strelok and try to work out a compromise.
Kill Strelok.
Kill Degtyarev.
Degtyarev is dead. Inform Strelok about his fate.
Strelok is dead. Talk with Degtyarev.
Tell Degtyarev that Strelok is willing to cooperate on his own terms.
You have decided to help Strelok get rid of Degtyarev. Kill the Colonel.
A UNISG force is after Degtyarev. Help him repel their assault.
The UNISG squad is done for. Talk with Degtyarev.
Degtyarev and his team have left. Tell Strelok that you're all good to go.
